meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kate Reed Hauenstein Megan Hersman Kirstin Cutts Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7464.

td.p: Kate Reed Hauenstein, a high school history teacher from Cedar Park, Texas
Megan Hersman, an arts marketer from Chicago, Illinois
Kirstin Cutts, a graduate student from Austin, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,001)

tr.td: COUNTRIES' NEWSPAPERS
POTENT POTABLES
MAN VS. BEAST
PLAYING TRIBUTE
"V"OCABULARY
SLAMILTON
(Alex: You have to name the person that the famous Alexander Hamilton was badmouthing with these quotes.)
